Index.title: Hello World
Index.snailsMeterDescription: Experience the whimsical world of candy with 'Snail's Meter'! This delightful treat combines fun and flavor in a unique way that will excite both children and adults alike. With its playful snail design, 'Snail's Meter' offers a burst of sweet taste in every bite. Packaged in a compact box measuring 430 × 360 x 372 mm, this candy is perfect for parties, gatherings, or just a fun snack at home. Each display contains 12 individual packs, making it ideal for sharing with friends and family. With 72 packs per master case, it's also a great choice for retail and wholesale purposes. Despite its compact size, 'Snail's Meter' packs a punch with a net weight of 4.90 Kg and a gross weight of 6.80 Kg. The volume of 0.058 m³ ensures that it fits neatly into storage spaces while still offering ample quantities for enjoyment. Plus, with a shelf life of 24 months, you can stock up without worrying about it losing its delicious flavor.  Get ready to enjoy the sweet, playful, and fun 'Snail's Meter' – a candy that's as delightful to look at as it is to eat!
